targets.query:
// Query inverter
inverter = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "realtime" and r._field == "Inverter_Text")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.endpoint == "Manufacturer" or r.endpoint == "Model" or r.endpoint == "Serialnumber" or r.endpoint == "Version")
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: [], columnKey: ["endpoint"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "_field", "device_id", "unit"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _join: "1"}))

// Query site_details - CAMBIATO DA -7d A -1h
site = from(bucket: "Solaredge")
  |> range(start: -1h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "api" and r.endpoint == "site_details" and r._field == "Info")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r.metric == "name" or 
      r.metric == "status" or 
      r.metric == "peakPower" or 
      r.metric == "installationDate" or
      r.metric == "location_address" or
      r.metric == "location_city" or
      r.metric == "location_zip" or
      r.metric == "location_latitude" or
      r.metric == "location_longitude" or
      r.metric == "primaryModule_manufacturerName" or
      r.metric == "primaryModule_modelName" or
      r.metric == "type"
  )
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> pivot(rowKey: [], columnKey: ["metric"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> drop(columns: ["_start", "_stop", "_measurement", "endpoint", "unit", "_field"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _join: "1"}))

// Join
join(
  tables: {i: inverter, s: site},
  on: ["_join"]
)
  |> drop(columns: ["_join", "_time_i", "_time_s"])

import "timezone"
import "date"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "realtime" and
    r._field == "Inverter" and
    r.endpoint == "Power Ac" and
    r.unit == "W"

  |> group(columns: [])

  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Produzione"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","Produzione"])
  |> yield(name: "produzione_last_W")

import "timezone"
import "date"
option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d)
stop  = date.add(d: 1d, to: start)

dailyDeltaWh = (tables=<-) => {
  f = tables
    |> first()
    |> keep(columns: ["device_id", "_value"])
    |> set(key: "kind", value: "start")

  l = tables
    |> last()
    |> keep(columns: ["device_id", "_value"])
    |> set(key: "kind", value: "end")

  return union(tables: [f, l])
    |> pivot(rowKey: ["device_id"], columnKey: ["kind"], valueColumn: "_value")
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r.end) - float(v: r.start) }))
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: if r._value < 0.0 then 0.0 else r._value }))
    |> group(columns: [])
    |> sum(column: "_value")
}

from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: start, stop: stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "realtime" and
    r._field == "Inverter" and
    r.endpoint == "Energy Total" and
    r.unit == "Wh"
  )
  |> group(columns: ["device_id"])
  |> dailyDeltaWh()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    _time: date.truncate(
      t: if date.millisecond(t: now()) >= 500 then date.add(d: 1s, to: now()) else now(),
      unit: 1s
    )
  }))
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "produzione_oggi_wh"})
  |> keep(columns: ["_time","produzione_oggi_wh"])
  |> yield(name: "produzione_fotovoltaica_oggi_wh")

import "date"
import "array"
import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d)

// Dati Export Energy
data = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: start)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "realtime" and
    r._field == "Meter" and
    r.endpoint == "Export Energy Active" and
    r.unit == "Wh" and
    exists r._value)

// Calcolo immissione (ultimo - primo)
immissione_wh = (data |> last() |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0))._value - 
                (data |> first() |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0))._value

// Output
array.from(rows: [{
  _time: now(),
  "Immissione Oggi (Wh)": immissione_wh
}])

import "date"
import "array"
import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d)
month_start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1mo)

// Recupera prezzo PUN
pun_value = (from(bucket: "GME")
  |> range(start: month_start)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r._measurement == "gme_monthly_avg" and 
      r._field == "pun_kwh_avg")
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0))._value

// Dati prelievo
data = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: start)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r._measurement == "realtime" and 
      r._field == "Meter" and 
      r.endpoint == "Import Energy Active" and 
      r.unit == "Wh" and
      exists r._value)

prelievo_wh = (data |> last() |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0))._value - 
              (data |> first() |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0))._value

// Output
array.from(rows: [{
  _time: now(),
  "PUN (€/kWh)": pun_value,
  "Costo Prelievo Oggi (€)": if prelievo_wh < 0.0 
                              then 0.0 
                              else (prelievo_wh / 1000.0) * pun_value
}])

import "timezone"
import "date"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

today_start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d)

from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: today_start)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r._measurement == "realtime" and
      r._field == "Inverter" and
      r.endpoint == "Power Ac" and
      r.unit == "W")
  |> group()
  |> max()
  |> map(fn: (r) => {
      h = date.hour(t: r._time)
      m = date.minute(t: r._time)
      
      return {
          ORARIO: (if h < 10 then "0" else "") + string(v: h) + ":" +
                  (if m < 10 then "0" else "") + string(v: m),
          VALORE: r._value
      }
  })

import "timezone"
import "date"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

today_start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d)

from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: today_start)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
      r._measurement == "realtime" and
      ((r._field == "Inverter" and r.endpoint == "Power Ac") or
       (r._field == "Meter" and r.endpoint == "Power")))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5s, fn: mean)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => {
      inv = if exists r.Inverter then r.Inverter else 0.0
      met = if exists r.Meter then r.Meter else 0.0
      
      return {
          _time: r._time,
          _value: inv - met  // Rinomino in _value invece di Consumo
      }
  })
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0.0)
  |> max()  // Ora funziona senza parametri!
  |> map(fn: (r) => {
      h = date.hour(t: r._time)
      m = date.minute(t: r._time)
      
      return {
          ORARIO: (if h < 10 then "0" else "") + string(v: h) + ":" +
                  (if m < 10 then "0" else "") + string(v: m),
          VALORE: r._value
      }
  })

      r._measurement == "realtime" and

importata_value = (data_importata |> last() |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0))._value - 
                  (data_importata |> first() |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0))._value

// Energia prodotta

  |> range(start: today_start)

      r._measurement == "realtime" and

      r.endpoint == "Energy Total" and
      exists r._value)

prodotta_value = (data_prodotta |> last() |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0))._value -

      r.endpoint == "Export Energy Active" and

import "timezone"
import "date"
import "array"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1d)
stop = date.add(d: 1d, to: start)
month_start = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1mo)

// Recupera prezzo PUN medio mensile (già pre-calcolato)
prezzo_pun = from(bucket: "GME")
  |> range(start: month_start)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "gme_monthly_avg" and r._field == "pun_kwh_avg")
  |> last()
  |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

// Produzione giornaliera
data_prod = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: start, stop: stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "realtime" and r._field == "Inverter" and r.endpoint == "Energy Total" and r.unit == "Wh")

first_prod = data_prod |> first() |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)
last_prod = data_prod |> last() |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)
prod_value = last_prod._value - first_prod._value

// Export giornaliero
data_exp = from(bucket: "Solaredge_Realtime")
  |> range(start: start, stop: stop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "realtime" and r._field == "Meter" and r.endpoint == "Export Energy Active" and r.unit == "Wh")

first_exp = data_exp |> first() |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)
last_exp = data_exp |> last() |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)
exp_value = last_exp._value - first_exp._value

// Autoconsumo e risparmio
autoconsumo = if (prod_value - exp_value) < 0.0 then 0.0 else (prod_value - exp_value)
risparmio = (autoconsumo / 1000.0) * prezzo_pun._value

array.from(rows: [{PUN: prezzo_pun._value, Risparmio: risparmio}])

import "timezone"
import "date"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

startOfYear = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1y)
endOfYear = date.add(d: 1y, to: startOfYear)

from(bucket: "Solaredge")
  |> range(start: startOfYear, stop: endOfYear)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "web" and r["_field"] == "Site")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r["endpoint"] == "PRODUCTION_ENERGY" or 
      r["endpoint"] == "IMPORT_ENERGY" or 
      r["endpoint"] == "EXPORT_ENERGY"
  )
  // Deduplicazione giornaliera
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  
  // Somma annuale
  |> sum()
  
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_start"], columnKey: ["endpoint"], valueColumn: "_value")
  
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
      Produzione: if exists r.PRODUCTION_ENERGY then r.PRODUCTION_ENERGY else 0.0,
      Prelievo: if exists r.IMPORT_ENERGY then r.IMPORT_ENERGY else 0.0,
      Immissione: if exists r.EXPORT_ENERGY then r.EXPORT_ENERGY else 0.0
  }))
  
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      Autoconsumo: r.Produzione - r.Immissione,
      Consumo: r.Produzione - r.Immissione + r.Prelievo // (Autoconsumo + Prelievo)
  }))
  
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: now(),
      _value: if r.Consumo > 0.0 then (r.Autoconsumo / r.Consumo) * 100.0 else 0.0,
      _field: "Indipendenza_Energetica"
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value", "_field"])
  |> yield(name: "Indipendenza_Anno_Corrente")

import "timezone"
import "date"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

startOfYear = date.truncate(t: now(), unit: 1y)
endOfYear = date.add(d: 1y, to: startOfYear)

from(bucket: "Solaredge")
  |> range(start: startOfYear, stop: endOfYear)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "web" and r["_field"] == "Site")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r["endpoint"] == "PRODUCTION_ENERGY" or 
      r["endpoint"] == "IMPORT_ENERGY" or 
      r["endpoint"] == "EXPORT_ENERGY"
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> sum()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_start"], columnKey: ["endpoint"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ 
      Produzione: if exists r.PRODUCTION_ENERGY then r.PRODUCTION_ENERGY else 0.0,
      Prelievo: if exists r.IMPORT_ENERGY then r.IMPORT_ENERGY else 0.0,
      Immissione: if exists r.EXPORT_ENERGY then r.EXPORT_ENERGY else 0.0
  }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      r with
      Consumo: r.Produzione + r.Prelievo - r.Immissione
  }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: now(),
      "% Prelievo": if r.Consumo > 0.0 then (r.Prelievo / r.Consumo) * 100.0 else 0.0,
      _field: "Percentuale_Prelievo"
  }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "% Prelievo", "_field"])
  |> yield(name: "Percentuale_Prelievo_Anno_Corrente")

import "timezone"
import "date"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

// Dati reali
real_data = from(bucket: "Solaredge")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "web")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Optimizer group")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["endpoint"] == "PRODUCTION_POWER")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

// Trova primo e ultimo dato con gestione sicura
first_record = real_data |> first() |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)
last_record = real_data |> last() |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

// Gestione sicura del controllo produzione finita
now_time = now()
production_ended = if exists last_record._time then
    int(v: now_time) - int(v: last_record._time) > 1800000000000  // 30 minuti
else
    true  // Se non ci sono dati, considera produzione finita

// Timeline completa
from(bucket: "Solaredge")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "web")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Optimizer group")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["endpoint"] == "PRODUCTION_POWER")
    |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
    |> map(fn: (r) => {
        value = if not exists first_record._time then
            0.0  // Nessun dato disponibile
        else if r._time < first_record._time then
            0.0  // Prima del primo dato
        else if exists last_record._time and r._time > last_record._time and production_ended then
            0.0  // Dopo l'ultimo dato e produzione finita
        else
            r._value
        
        return {
            _time: r._time,
            _value: value,
            device_id: r.device_id
        }
    })
    |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value)
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        _time: r._time, 
        _value: r._value, 
        _field: r.device_id
    }))
    |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

import "timezone"
import "date"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

// Conta dati grezzi prima di aggregare
raw_data = from(bucket: "Solaredge")
    |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "web")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Optimizer group")
    |> filter(fn: (r) => r["endpoint"] == "PRODUCTION_POWER")

count_check = raw_data 
    |> count() 
    |> group()
    |> sum()
    |> findRecord(fn: (key) => true, idx: 0)

// Query dati aggregati solo se esistono
data = if exists count_check._value and count_check._value > 0 then
    raw_data
        |> aggregateWindow(every: 15m, fn: last, createEmpty: true)
        |> fill(column: "_value", value: 0.0)
else
    // Dataset vuoto invece di dummy
    raw_data |> limit(n: 0)

// Processa solo se ci sono dati
data
    |> filter(fn: (r) => exists r._value)  // Filtra eventuali valori null
    |> map(fn: (r) => ({
        _time: r._time,
        _value: r._value,
        _field: r.device_id
    }))
    |> group()
    |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

emission_factor_kg_per_kwh = 0.4

from(bucket: "Solaredge")
  |> range(start: 2021-09-01T00:00:00Z)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r._measurement == "web" and 
      r._field == "Site" and
      (r.endpoint == "PRODUCTION_ENERGY" or 
       r.endpoint == "EXPORT_ENERGY" or 
       r.endpoint == "IMPORT_ENERGY")
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> group(columns: ["endpoint"])
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with dummy: "total"}))
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["dummy"], columnKey: ["endpoint"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => {
      prod = r.PRODUCTION_ENERGY
      imp = r.IMPORT_ENERGY
      exp = r.EXPORT_ENERGY
      
      return {
          Produzione: prod,
          Immissione: exp,
          Prelievo: imp,
          Consumo: (prod + imp - exp) / 1000.0,
          Autoconsumo: prod - exp,
          "Emissioni CO2 Evitate": (prod / 1000.0) * emission_factor_kg_per_kwh,
          "% Autoconsumo": ((prod - exp) / (prod + imp - exp)) * 100.0,
          "% Prelievo": (imp / (prod + imp - exp)) * 100.0
      }
  })

import "date"
import "join"
import "timezone"

option location = timezone.location(name: "Europe/Rome")

// 1. Consumo mensile da Site
consumo = from(bucket: "Solaredge")
  |> range(start: 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => 
      r._measurement == "web" and 
      r._field == "Site" and
      (r.endpoint == "PRODUCTION_ENERGY" or 
       r.endpoint == "IMPORT_ENERGY" or 
       r.endpoint == "EXPORT_ENERGY")
  )
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1mo, fn: sum, location: location, timeSrc: "_start")
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["endpoint"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      year: string(v: date.year(t: r._time)),
      month: string(v: date.month(t: r._time)),
      consumo_wh: r.PRODUCTION_ENERGY + r.IMPORT_ENERGY - r.EXPORT_ENERGY
  }))
  |> group()

// 2. PUN mensile
pun = from(bucket: "GME")
  |> range(start: 0)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "gme_monthly_avg" and r._field == "pun_kwh_avg")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      year: r.year,
      month: string(v: date.month(t: r._time)),
      pun: r._value
  }))
  |> group()

// 3. Join e calcolo costo totale
join.inner(
  left: consumo,
  right: pun,
  on: (l, r) => l.year == r.year and l.month == r.month,
  as: (l, r) => ({
    _time: l._time,
    _value: (l.consumo_wh / 1000.0) * r.pun
  })
)
  |> sum()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({"Spesa Senza Fotovoltaico": r._value}))
